name: finisher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or animal that finishes an athletic competition
a worker or machine involved in the last stage of making a product: I take goods from the factory to our painters and finishers.

a person or animal who completes an athletic competition: She was one of the top ten finishers in the race.
